title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedder inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starters available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat, embed, pull and list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (cuda/rocm/cpu) and compose examples for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI fork that adds Ollama backend support; switch between local backends seamlessly.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Utility repo showing how to generate and store embeddings with Ollama for semantic search demos.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers channel questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-model-mirror
summary: Scripts to mirror Ollama model blobs to private registries or air-gapped environments.
